plot: A young female doctor cares for a dying boy in her hospital. The boy develops a love and trust for her that makes him want to protect her even in death.
title: A House of Mad Souls
plot_es: A young female doctor cares for a dying boy in her hospital. The boy develops a love and trust for her that makes him want to protect her even in death.
plot_en: A young female doctor cares for a dying boy in her hospital. The boy develops a love and trust for her that makes him want to protect her even in death.
